ViewObject.Name: ApInvoiceSearchVVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT ApInvoicesInterfaceV.ROW_ID, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.GLOBAL_ATTRIBUTE4, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.GLOBAL_ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.AWT_GROUP_ID, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.CREATED_BY, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.CREATION_DATE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.DESCRIPTION, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.DOC_CATEGORY_CODE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.EXCHANGE_DATE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.EXCHANGE_RATE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.EXCHANGE_RATE_TYPE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.USER_RATE_TYPE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.GOODS_RECEIVED_DATE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.INVOICE_AMOUNT, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.INVOICE_DATE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.INVOICE_ID, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.INVOICE_NUM, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.INVOICE_RECEIVED_DATE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.LAST_UPDATED_BY, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.PAY_GROUP_LOOKUP_CODE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.PO_NUMBER, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.SEGMENT1, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.SOURCE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.GROUP_ID, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.TERMS_ID, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.VENDOR_ID, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.VENDOR_SITE_ID, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.VOUCHER_NUM, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.STATUS, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.REQUEST_ID, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.WORKFLOW_FLAG, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.GL_DATE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.ACCTS_PAY_CODE_COMBINATION_ID, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.EXCLUSIVE_PAYMENT_FLAG, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.INVOICE_TYPE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.STATUS_DSP, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.SOURCE_DSP, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.TERMS_NAME, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.DOC_CATEGORY_NAME, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.VENDOR_NAME, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.VENDOR_NUMBER, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.VENDOR_SITE_CODE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.INVOICE_AMOUNT_LIMIT, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.AWT_GROUP_NAME, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.ORG_ID, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.PAYMENT_CROSS_RATE_TYPE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.PAYMENT_CROSS_RATE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.PAYMENT_CROSS_RATE_DATE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.PAYMENT_CURRENCY_CODE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.AMOUNT_APPLICABLE_TO_DISCOUNT, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.PREPAY_NUM, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.PREPAY_APPLY_AMOUNT, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.PREPAY_GL_DATE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.INVOICE_INCLUDES_PREPAY_FLAG, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.NO_XRATE_BASE_AMOUNT, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.TERMS_DATE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.REQUESTER_ID, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.OPERATING_UNIT, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.PREPAY_LINE_NUM, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.REQUESTER_FIRST_NAME, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.REQUESTER_LAST_NAME, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.REQUESTER_EMPLOYEE_NUM, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.LEGAL_ENTITY_ID, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.CALC_TAX_DURING_IMPORT_FLAG, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.CONTROL_AMOUNT, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.ADD_TAX_TO_INV_AMT_FLAG, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.TAX_RELATED_INVOICE_ID, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.TAXATION_COUNTRY, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.DOCUMENT_SUB_TYPE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.SUPPLIER_TAX_INVOICE_NUMBER, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.SUPPLIER_TAX_INVOICE_DATE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.SUPPLIER_TAX_EXCHANGE_RATE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.TAX_INVOICE_RECORDING_DATE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.TAX_INVOICE_INTERNAL_SEQ, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.PAYMENT_METHOD_CODE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.IBY_PAYMENT_METHOD, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.PAYMENT_REASON_CODE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.PAYMENT_REASON, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.PAYMENT_REASON_COMMENTS, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.UNIQUE_REMITTANCE_IDENTIFIER, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.URI_CHECK_DIGIT, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.REMITTANCE_MESSAGE1, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.REMITTANCE_MESSAGE2, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.REMITTANCE_MESSAGE3, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.BANK_CHARGE_BEARER, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.BANK_CHARGE_BEARER_DSP, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.DELIVERY_CHANNEL_CODE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.DELIVERY_CHANNEL, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.SETTLEMENT_PRIORITY, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.SETTLEMENT_PRIORITY_DSP, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.PARTY_ID, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.PARTY_SITE_ID, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.NET_OF_RETAINAGE_FLAG, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.PORT_OF_ENTRY_CODE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.EXTERNAL_BANK_ACCOUNT_ID, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.BANK_ACCOUNT_NUMBER, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.PAY_AWT_GROUP_ID, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.PAY_AWT_GROUP_NAME, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.REMIT_TO_SUPPLIER_NAME, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.REMIT_TO_SUPPLIER_ID, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.REMIT_TO_SUPPLIER_SITE, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.REMIT_TO_SUPPLIER_SITE_ID, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.RELATIONSHIP_ID, ApInvoicesInterfaceV.REMIT_TO_SUPPLIER_NUM FROM AP_INVOICES_INTERFACE_V ApInvoicesInterfaceV where WORKFLOW_FLAG ='V' AND SOURCE IN ('OIOXML','INVOICE GATEWAY')
